title: Tencent invests $297 million into Ubisoft
description: Ubisoft said there will be no change in leadership after the Chinese conglomerate Tencent purchased a 9.9 percent stake in the video game publisher.

title: Trump’s Truth Social steps closer to a financial cliff
description: A Trump-allied investment company could be forced to liquidate if holders of 65 percent of its shares don't approve a one-year extension of its merger with Trump’s company.

title: ‘Temtem’ is a Pokémon clone that Pokémon would be wise to emulate
description: In "Temtem," the indie developer Crema has put out arguably the best non-Pokémon monster-tamer on the market.

title: Yes, it’s a scam: Simple tips to help you spot online fraud
description: The ultimate guide to not falling for scams from red flags to conversations you should have with loved ones.

title: Encrypted app Signal just hired one of Big Tech’s sharpest critics
description: Meredith Whittaker, the former Google manager, is Signal’s first president. She is out to convince users to pay for the free app.
